cpl.readme:
; Narenj
Narenj is a sidebar tool. It adds a viewtoolbar button to pin a tiddler from story river to a sidebar tab. It also adds a side editor as a sidebar tab, to edit tiddler side by side to opened tiddlers in the story river.

; Code and demo
For learning plugin features, syntax, tutorial and examples see the plugin demo and code pages.

* Demo: https://kookma.github.io/TW-Narenj/
* Code: https://github.com/kookma/TW-Narenj
cpl.title: $:/plugins/kookma/narenj
